expires.help: Override expiration date and time, from 5 minutes to 365 from now (format: yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm:ss).
expires.name: expires

ip.help: IPv4 address which the override applies.
ip.name: ip

ip6.help: IPv6 address which the override applies.
ip6.name: ip6

new-profile.help: Name of the new web filter profile used by the override.
new-profile.name: new-profile

old-profile.help: Name of the web filter profile which the override applies.
old-profile.name: old-profile

scope.help: Override either the specific user, user group, IPv4 address, or IPv6 address.
scope.name: scope

user.help: Name of the user which the override applies.
user.name: user

user-group.help: Specify the user group for which the override applies.
user-group.name: user-group

results.help: Configure FortiGuard Web Filter administrative overrides.
results.name: override
